attributes.action: Make sure Gibraltar is treated like the rest UK after brexit.
attributes.background: The EU negotiators have given Spain a veto on any deal that affects Gibraltar, they are our Brother and Sisters, and must be treated the same as us. Thus what ever rules we have in place, is the same for them as well.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/193782
